ValidationRule.description: Prevents edits to Deliverable records that have been Approved and Locked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISCHANGED( PgM_Acceptance_Criteria__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Actual_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Lifecycle__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Approved_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Approver__c ) || ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Description__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Mitigation__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Planned_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Primary_Owner__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Program__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Rating__c ) || ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Submitter__c )) && PgM_Record_Locked__c = true && ISPICKVAL( PgM_Lifecycle__c , 'Approved')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Deliverable has been approved and the record is locked.
